welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sale, a charming town known for its picturesque canal, thriving shopping district, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and make the most of all the city has to offer. Happy exploring!

restaurants.name: Redd Catt
restaurants.description: Redd Catt is a café located in Sale.

restaurants.name: Mr Raymond
restaurants.description: Mr Raymond is a café located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used by various charter airlines for seasonal and holiday flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
